# INdlæsning af pakker

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

# Indlæsning af data


```{r}
homicide <- read_csv("data/homicide-rates-across-western-europe-exam.csv")
```



# Visualisering

```{r}
ggplot(data = homicide) + 
  geom_col(mapping = aes(x = Year, y = homicide_rate)) +
  facet_wrap(~ Entity)
```


```
```{r}
ggsave("homicide_rate.pdf", width = 40, height = 20, units = "cm")

```
